title: "BJP's Unproductive Politics": AAP Backs Rahul Gandhi In Defamation Case
selftext: Aap certainly seems to not take sides for or against any party, their support for UCC(well until Bhagwant Mann spoke against it) while most of the opposition is against it. Their row with the Congress over Ordinance, to supporting Rahul Gandhi here, providing help to Karnataka from Punjab(read that somewhere) and constant criticism of both parties. Are they attempting on becoming a third front and be neutral between the two opposing sides?
comments: I think it's just them appealing to bjp's base with ucc and sec 370 type matters. Considering the gloves off fight between them and the centre, there isn't much room for them to remain neutral. A third front is something they would love to become, but its never been done before.
